precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
A right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Themes' tab is active.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become active. The content area will update to show screen saver options, including a dropdown menu, a wait time setting, and a preview window.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Click the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu and select '(None)'.
expected_results: The selected screensaver will change to '(None)' and a pop-up window titled 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear at the bottom of the screen.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu is open, showing a list of available options.
action: Click the 'None' option in the 'Screen Saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close, the 'Wait' time will change to '10' minutes, and a pop-up notification reading 'Keep your computer up to date' will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open with the "Screen Saver" tab active.
expected_results: A new window titled "Power Options Properties" will open in front of the "Display Properties" window. The new window will contain a "Power schemes" dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab active. The "Power schemes" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Power schemes" dropdown menu and select "Home/Office Desk".
expected_results: The selected power scheme will change to "Always On" and the "Turn off monitor" setting will update to "After 20 mins".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Always On" power scheme should be selected from the "Power schemes" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "System hibernates" dropdown menu will expand, displaying a list of time options with "After 5 hours" selected by default. The "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", and "System standby" options will change from "Never" to dropdown menus with selectable time ranges.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active. The "Always On" power scheme should be selected.
action: Click the information icon next to the "System standby" option.
expected_results: A pop-up box titled "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Apply" button highlighted.
expected_results: A yellow pop-up notification with the message "Keep your computer up to date" will appear in the bottom right corner of the screen. The "OK" button will no longer be highlighted.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
action: Click on any area of the screen outside the "Power Options Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will lose focus, and the "Display Properties" window will become active.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
